1.title: Simplification
1.text: SENTA evaluates the complexity of each sentence and simplifies the complex ones, while leaving the simple ones unchanged.

2.title: Analysis
2.text: The analysis of main characteristics is conducted for the original text and the simplified text, including the percentages of words not included in the general reference or textbook wordlists.

3.title: Editing
3.text: In SENTA, you can edit the simplified text in both views, and copy it for further use.
